mean_cn: v.（在竞争或比赛中）输掉；失去；遗失
mean_en: to have something/somebody taken away from you as a result of an accident, getting old, dying, etc.; to have less and less of something, especially until you no longer have any of it
sentence: The boxer lying on the ground lost to his more skilled opponent.
sentence_trans: 这个躺在地上的拳击手输给了比他更厉害的对手。
